It takes less than a second flipping a switch.
You don't stop to wonder what it's connected to or how it works.
...the ring you've been carrying around for three days,...
...whether her sister kept it secret and whether her dad approves.
If putting the ring in the cheesecake is cheesy,...
...you're thinking about the 17 different ways she could react, and hoping it'll mean yes.
You don't think about what goes into powering that switch...
